text:
Nov 5
• Huddle with Amrutha to guide on ABDM demo
• Discussion with Aakash about a bug in ABDM signal
• Fixed a couple of sentry issues in ABDM (#54)
• Minor discussion with Nihal and Sam on discharge disposition required behaviour
• Tried fixing the toast issue in plugs (tried multiple versions, no luck)
Next
• Complete #14236 and #14242
• Plugin registry implementation

Nov 6
• Call with Amrutha going over things for ka demo (abdm, nhcx, upi payments)
• Huddle with Shivank to try out live razorpay creds for ka demo (did not work)
• Worked on Plugin Registry
◦ Created static json structure for commonly used plugs
◦ Partially expanded on dynamic plug poc (added support for rendering plug pages)
Next
• Try to complete minimum working version of plugin registry
• Complete #14236 and #14242
• Sort out making discharge disposition mandatory
• Pass frontend plug envs via care core

Nov 7
• Deployed ABDM PHR in teleicu instance
• Raised a PR 14268 for making discharge disposition mandatory
• Made translations dynamic in dynamic plugs poc PR
• Dropped the plugin registry idea and will be moving on with dynamic plugs

Nov 10
• Followed up on feedbacks on #14268
• Huddle with Yaswanth to discuss Playwright tests
• Meeting with Amrutha to help out with ABDM demo setup and recordings
Next
• Add Scan and share in PHR
• Scan and share as TokenQueue

Nov 11
• Added scan and share functionality in PHR
Next
• Scan and share as a token queue

Nov 12
• Fixed 2 ABDM related recurring issues on Sentry in v3 instances
• Huddle with Amrutha to walk over the ABDM demo flow
• Fixed issues noticed during the demo rehearsal with Amrutha
Next
• Scan and share as a token queue
• Final walk through of ABDM demo with Amrutha
• Go over the assigned issues across all the repos and plan accordingly
